sentence: "Good for Brian Kemp who stayed the course and showed what you can do when you have a real record to run on and you don't have to kowtow to this and you don't have to change yourself -- be who you are and that authenticity has carried him."
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Trump to blame for 'embarrassing' end of David Perdue's political career: Mitch McConnell adviser

title: McConnell Adviser Blames Trump for 'Embarrassing' End to Perdue's Career
